articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Tunisian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Tunisian President
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Zine el Abidine Ben Ali, President of Tunisia, on the occasion of its national day.
					Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the President good health and happiness and the friendly Tunisian people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Tunisian PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Tunisian PM
Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greetings to his Tunisian counterpart Mohamed Ghannouchi on the occasion of the 54th national day of the country.
					 Wishing the government and people of Tunisia steady prosperity and wellbeing, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: Workers' Party Greets Congress of Algerian Party
articles.content:
Workers' Party Greets Congress of Algerian Party
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a message of greetings to the 9th Congress of the Algerian National Liberation Front Party on Friday.
					 The message expressed belief that the congress would mark an important occasion in the struggle of the above-said party to strengthen itself and achieve national reconciliation and unity and the independent development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 Convinced that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the future in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, the message wished the congress a big success in its work.

articles.title: S. Korean Authority Accused of Blocking Resumption of Tour
articles.content:
S. Korean Authority Accused of Blocking Resumption of Tour
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The General Scenic Spots Development Guidance Bureau of the DPRK issued a detailed report Friday condemning the conservative group of south Korea for having suspended the tour of Mt. Kumgang and the Kaesong area.
					 Accusing the south Korean puppet clique of making outcry, asserting the "incident of a tourist in Mt. Kumgang" which occurred in July 2008 was "an excessive retaliation" and "a bullet was fired at the defenseless tourist," the report says this was as preposterous and brazen-faced sophism as patting a stray dog on the back.
					
					 As for the accountability for the "incident," it took place due to the carelessness of the victim in every respect and the responsibility for it rests with the south Korean authorities who failed to properly take care and control the tourists, the report says. 
					
					 It gives a detailed account of the truth about the incident.
					
					 The conservative group of south Korea put the "probe into the truth" behind the "above-said incident," "guarantee of safety of tourists" and measures for the "prevention of recurrence of similar incident" as "three preconditions" and asserted that the tour cannot be resumed unless they are met and that the "government remains unchanged in this stand," the report points out, adding:
					
					 This is nothing but deliberate efforts to scotch the tour.
					
					 As for the safety of tourists and measures for the prevention of recurrence of similar incidents, the north and the south reached an agreement on them after having an exhaustive discussion and the north side assured the south side of them on several occasions as separate issues.
					
					 The puppet conservative group including the "Ministry of Unification" is standing in the way of resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang and the Kaesong area, citing the "three preconditions" as pretext, not prompted by its true concern about the safety of south Korean tourists or worry about the recurrence of the tourist incident.
					
					 Citing facts to prove this, the report goes on to say:
					
					 By nature the puppet regime has never been concerned about the safety and lives of people as it has regarded sycophancy, treachery and fascist dictatorship as its physiology, kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 Delegates of the south side, sitting at the negotiating table with the north side, staged such charade as "paying silent tribute" to the deceased tourist and raised a hue and cry over "personal safety" and the like in a desperate bid to block the above-said tour. The ulterior aim sought by them through this behavior is to escalate the row of nuclear confrontation with the DPRK and tighten the "sanctions" against it, pursuant to the U.S.
					
					 Also lurking behind the attitude of the conservative group is a sinister aim to drive the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe in violation of the north-south joint declaration and build a higher barrier of division and confrontation, going against national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that it is impossible to settle the issue of resuming the tour no matter how many times the north and south sides may sit at the negotiating table unless the south Korean authorities roll back their policy of confrontation against reunification.
					
					 The denial of the resumption of the tour means a denial of the inter-Korean relations and that of the north-south joint declaration and reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 The puppet conservative group is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can gain something by blocking the above-said tour.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to properly understand the gravity of the situation and behave themselves.

articles.title: National Meeting Held
articles.content:
National Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday to commemorate the centenary of birth of Kim Il, a revolutionary fighter.
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, persons of merit and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Il, born into a poor peasant family in Orang County, North Hamgyong Province on March 20, 1910, joined the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and contributed to the historic victory of the great anti-Japanese war.
					
					 Holding responsible posts as vice-minister of National Defence, a military representative of the Front Command and chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, etc. after the country's liberation and in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War, he made a distinguished contribution to the building of the revolutionary armed forces and the victory in the war and the strengthening and development of the Party.
					
					 He worked at such responsible posts as vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, first vice-premier of the Cabinet, premier of the Administration Council and first vice-president of the DPRK in the period of the postwar rehabilitation and construction, the socialist revolution and the socialist construction.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 Kim Il was a loyal revolutionary and a true patriot who took part in many bloody battles, upholding President Kim Il Sung from the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and resolutely defended and upheld the Party and the leader in the annals of the revolution including the building of a new country, the great war fought against the U.S. and the socialist construction, the reporter noted, and said:
					
					An excellent activist of the Party and the state and a loyal revolutionary soldier, Kim Il set a living example in remaining faithful to the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il with pure conscience and noble sense of obligation, possessed of a transparent revolutionary viewpoint on the leader.
					
					 He was a steadfast revolutionary of Juche type and a paragon of true human beings as he was respected and loved by the people for his intense loyalty to the Party and the leader, devotedly service to the country and its people and precious feats performed for the era and the revolution as a political activist of the Party and the state and for his noble personality.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the officials, party members and other working people to learn from the transparent viewpoint on the leader of the revolutionary forerunners including Kim Il and become true Songun revolutionary comrades and ardent fighters who absolutely trust and devotedly protect Kim Jong Il and share the idea, will and destiny with him in the struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: New Species of Stevia Bred
articles.content:
New Species of Stevia Bred
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Researchers of Pyongyang University of Agriculture have recently succeeded in breeding a new species of stevia.
					 Stevia, a perennial plant belonging to the Compositae, is very high in sugar content. It, with no adverse effect on human body, is good for diabetes, hypertension, nephritis, digestion and stomach.   
					
					 The new species almost doubles the existing species common in Korea in the amount of sugar and its taste is also much better.
					
					 It, which gives no unnecessary taste but sweet smell, does not change in color and taste when it is mixed with foodstuffs. So it can be used in making cake, bread, cooling drinks and soybean paste and sauce, preparing vegetable food, processing meat and manufacturing medicines.   
					
					 It grows up to 1.2~1.6 meters in the first year and its leaf is much larger than the exiting species.
					
					 It has already begun to be cultivated in different areas of the country.

articles.title: Number of Macrobians Increases
articles.content:
Number of Macrobians Increases
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Jo In Gak, living in Okryu-dong No. 2, Taedonggang District, Pyongyang celebrated his centenary birthday with his wife, 92, in January.
					 The couple, still as well as those in their seventies in spirit, activity, speech, appetite, etc. owes their longevity to the advantageous socialist health system. 
					
					 Since a decision to enforce a free medical care system was adopted in the country on November 13, Juche 41 (1952), the state has taken care of the lives and health of the people in a responsible manner.
					
					 A medical service system and section doctor system are working well in each province, city, county and ri.
					
					 Some time ago telemedicine service began in the country, making it possible for hospitals throughout the country to give medical service to people in a quick and accurate way, interconnected with each other.
					
					 The DPRK, which turned the Korean Association for Assistance to the Elderly into the Federation for the Care of the Elderly of Korea in February 2006, has considered the protection of the elderly as one of the important state policies.
					
					 Law on Protection of the Elderly was adopted in April 2007 to provide a legal guarantee for protecting their rights and interests and ensuring their worthwhile and happy life in their concluding years. And an orderly system for the elderly protection has been established in the Cabinet, provinces, cities and counties.
					
					 The Korea General Red-Cross Hospital has a special department and research institute for the elderly, including macrobians above 100. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a close attention has been paid to strengthening the material and technical foundations of homes for the aged.
					
					 Prevailing in the country are beautiful traits of respecting and treating the aged preferentially and taking care of those with no one to depend on like their parents.
					
					 Sin Jong Suk in Tangsang-dong No.1 and Yun Nung Bae in Phalgol-dong No.1, Mangyongdae District of Pyongyang and Yu Nam Ho in Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province celebrated their centenary birthday this year.
					
					 Choe Pu Yong, 113, residing in Samsong-ri, Samsok District, Pyongyang is still well enough to tend her family garden and do some domestic chores.

articles.title: Key Resolve and Foal Eagle under Fire
articles.content:
Key Resolve and Foal Eagle under Fire 
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces described Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises as "annual" and "defensive". And they have gone the lengths of dismissing the repeated warnings of the DPRK as "oversensitive reaction" in a bid to mislead the pubic opinion at home and abroad. But with nothing can they hide the aggressive and provocative nature of the war maneuvers.
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 Citing facts, the commentary observes that scenarios for a war of aggression against the DPRK applied to the said war maneuvers and their program suffice to prove their offensive nature and danger.
					
					 It goes on to say:
					
					 It has become clearer that the U.S. and south Korean authorities' talk about "dialogue" and "peace" is nothing but sheer sophism to cover up their wicked true colors as disturbers of dialogue and provokers of a war.
					
					 The exercises have brought into bolder relief the bellicose true colors of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet trigger-happy forces as harassers of peace as they seek only to realize the wild ambition for invasion of the DPRK, utterly indifferent to the detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula and the process for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they think they can attain something by posing a grave threat to the DPRK and escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula to the extremes through the adventurous nuclear war exercises.
					
					 As clarified in the report issued recently by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK who regard the dignity and sovereignty of the nation as dearer than their own lives will clearly teach the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers what a miserable end they will meet if they dare ignite a war of aggression against it.

articles.title: S. Korean Bellicose Forces' War Exercises Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Bellicose Forces' War Exercises Flayed
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet bellicose forces staged the joint exercises for airlifting supplies for the first half of 2010 in Kyonggi and South Kangwon provinces on Mar. 15 and 16 and a river crossing drill in Kyonggi Province on Mar. 17, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 Involved in those exercises were the fifth tactical airborne corps of the puppet air force and the first logistic support command of the army. The exercises were reported to be mainly designed to rapidly hurl armed forces, equipment and war materiel necessary for executing a war in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 "C-130H" and "CN-235" and other huge war equipment were hurled into those madcap air dropping and air-lifting and landing exercises.
					
					 The warmongers of the sixth engineer brigade under the puppet sixth army corps were busy with ensuring the river-crossing of attacking units by mobilizing K-1 tanks, various type river-crossing facilities and huge forces.
					
					 This indicates that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces are keen on the exercises for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.

articles.title: Impeaching for Pro-Japanese Remarks Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Impeaching for Pro-Japanese Remarks Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A lawmaker from the Democratic Party of south Korea demanded an action for impeaching the puppet authorities for their pro-Japanese remarks.
					 He in his radio appearance on Monday charged that when the Japanese prime minister talked nonsense that "there was no way but to write Tok Islets as 'Takeshima' in textbooks for primary and middle schools" while the present chief executive was paying a visit to Japan in 2008, the latter asked the former just to wait for his action.
					
					 The lawmaker declared the above-said statement was, obviously, a target of impeachment as it meant giving up a duty to defend Tok Islets.
					
					 Accusing Chongwadae and the "Grand National Party" of continuing to keep mum about that issue, he added "it is clear that their attitude is to hush up the case at any cost."

articles.title: Angolan President Meets DPRK ambassador
articles.content:
Angolan President Meets DPRK ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The friendly and cooperative relations between Angola and the DPRK are long-standing special relations and their basis was provided in the period of the Angolan people's struggle for national independence.
					 Angolan President Jose Eduardo Dos Santos said this when receiving credentials from the DPRK ambassador to his country on Mar. 11.
					
					 The president said that the support and encouragement given by the DPRK to Angola made a great contribution to the struggle of the Angolan people for the independence and development of the country.
					
					 The bilateral relations have developed favorably, he said, extending congratulations to the Korean people on their successes made in building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said that he is rejoiced over the fact that the DPRK has made new progress in all fields including industry and agriculture, overcoming consecutive natural disasters and difficulties.
					
					 Angola fully supports the DPRK's efforts for the normalization of the DPRK-U.S. relations and the peaceful reunification of the country, regarding its proposal to terminate the hostile relations and conclude a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. as an important one, he declared.

articles.title: Asian Regional Seminar on Juche Idea Held in New Delhi
articles.content:
Asian Regional Seminar on Juche Idea Held in New Delhi
Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- An Asian regional seminar on the Juche idea titled "Self-reliance, road to independence" took place in New Delhi on Mar. 13.
					Displayed in the venue of the seminar were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and books and photos on their undying exploits.
					
					Attending it were the director general and the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and the director general, the secretary general and directors of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, the delegation of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, delegations of Juche idea study organizations in various countries and personages of different circles in India.
					
					The DPRK ambassador to India was present on invitation.
					
					Vishwanath, director general of the IIJI, made a keynote report to be followed by speeches of several personages under the titles "Let us uphold the banner of the Juche idea", "The ideological and theoretical foundation of the Songun politics," "Songun politics and Kim Jong Il", "Global independence and international law", "Juche idea, road to happy life" and "The Juche idea indicating the road to independence".
					
					The reporter and speakers said that Kim Il Sung, founder of the Juche idea, demonstrated the invincible power of the Juche idea by defeating two imperialisms in one generation and built socialism centered on the popular masses guided by the Juche idea.
					
					Noting that the idea founded by Kim Il Sung and being developed and enriched by Kim Jong Il and the spirit of self-reliance serve as guidelines for happy life, they stressed that Kim Jong Il is protecting the independent life of the Korean people by pursuing the Songun politics based on the Juche idea.
					
					They called upon the Juche idea followers to study in depth the Juche idea and the spirit of self-reliance and put them into practice and play a vanguard role in building an independent world.
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted there.
					
					The letter said that Kim Il Sung not only gave a clear definition of independence but clarified the idea that it is necessary to achieve independence in politics, self-sustenance in economy and self-reliance in national defence to put it into practice.
					
					It stressed that if all the people work hard in the spirit of self-reliance, the global independence will be realized earlier.
					
					The DPRK will shed its rays as a power of Juche with magnificent dignity and surely turn into a thriving reunified nation in the near future under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, noted the letter.
					
					The 13th meeting of the Board of Directors of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea was held in New Delhi on Mar. 12.
					
					The meeting reviewed the two-year work done by the board of directors and discussed the issues of further enhancing the function and role of the institute and more actively conducting the study and dissemination of the Juche idea on the occasion of the centenary of Kim Il Sung's birth.
					
					A decision was adopted at the meeting to significantly commemorate the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung.
					
					Harish Gupta was elected director general of the Asian Regional Institute and Mukesh Sharma its secretary general at the meeting.

articles.title: National Discrimination Blasted in Japan
articles.content:
National Discrimination Blasted in Japan
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A mothers' emergency meeting took place in Tokyo on March 16 to condemn the Japanese authorities' unreasonable policy of discrimination against the Korean schools in Japan. It was sponsored by the Central Liaison Council of the Society of Mothers of Korean Students in Japan.
					 Present there were officials of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan, members of societies of mothers of Korean students in different part of Japan and Japanese figures.
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Union Central Standing Committee, said at the meeting that the union and mothers would never tolerate the Japanese government's action to discriminate against the Korean schools under the groundless pretext and force the Korean children to fall victim to it. 
					
					 Declaring that with no far-fetched assertion can the government obliterate the inviolable national education of Koreans, she called upon all the Korean women to launch a dynamic struggle to protect their children's seats of learning and their rights to the last.
					
					 The reporter and speakers at the meeting branded the action of the Japanese authorities as politically motivated suppression aimed at stoking hostility toward the DPRK in the Japanese society and using the above-said education for meeting their unreasonable purpose. 
					
					  They urged the Japanese government to include without fail the Korean schools in Japan in the tuition-free program for senior high schools slated to take effect from April this year. 
					
					 Japanese figures, addressing the meeting, stated that the government's action to exclude the Korean schools from the said program is a human rights abuse and national discrimination. 
					
					 Noting that the students of the Korean schools should be granted an equal treatment with those of Japanese schools, they demanded the Japanese government duly guarantee the Korean students the right to learning.
					
					 A letter of request to the Japanese Prime Minister was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 At the end of the meeting its participants conducted information service at main railway stations in Tokyo.

articles.title: DDILF acusa a titeres surcoreanos de impedir la reanudacion del turismo
articles.content:
DDILF acusa a titeres surcoreanos de impedir la reanudacion del turismo
						
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ATCC) -- La Direccion de Desarrollo Integral de Lugares Famosos (DDILF) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 19 una informacion detallada condenando las maniobras criminales de la banda conservadora surcoreana que interrumpio el turismo al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong.
					Su texto resumido sigue abajo:
					
					Al cuestionar el "incidente de la turista surcoreana del monte Kumgang" ocurrido en julio de 2008, la banda de titeres surcoreanos arma escandalo describiendolo como la supuesta "reaccion excesiva" y el "fusilamiento a la turista indefensa", lo cual deviene una absurda y descarada sofisteria.
					
					La responsabilidad de ese caso esta en el descuido de la turista y en las autoridades surcoreanas que no controlaron debidamente a los turistas.
					
					Al presentar como "3 condiciones" la "aclaracion de los verdaderos aspectos" del incidente, el "aseguramiento de seguridad personal" y las medidas por la "prevencion de la repeticion de tal incidente", los conservadores surcoreanos insisten en que no pueden reiniciar el turismo antes de que sean cumplidas esas condiciones diciendo que es "invariable esta posicion del gobierno".
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una provocacion malintencionada para llevar al fracaso el turismo.
					
					La seguridad personal y la medida de prevencion de la repeticion de tal incidente fueron consultadas, resueltas y acordadas suficientemente entre ambas partes coreanas y garantizadas aparte varias veces a la parte surcoreana.
					
					La banda de los titeres conservadores, inclusive el "Ministerio de Reunificacion", se opone a la reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong planteando las "3 condiciones" no por su preocupacion de la seguridad personal de los turistas surcoreanos ni por el temor a la repeticion del citado incidente.
					
					Es que el poder titere surcoreano, que tiene como su atributo fisiologico servir a grandes potencias, especialmente a EE.UU., y practicar acciones vendepatrias y dictadura fascista, no ha tomado en consideracion desde el principio la seguridad ni la vida de los habitantes.
					
					Partiendo de su intencion de endurecer la campana de confrontacion nuclear y la "sancion" anti-RPDC siguiendo a EE.UU., los titeres surcoreanos impiden tan siniestramente el reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong escenificando en la mesa de negociaciones N-S la payasada de "guardar un momento de silencio" por el caso de una turista surcoreana muerta y hablando de la supuesta "seguridad personal".
					
					Ademas, abrigan otra siniestra intencion de violar y suprimir la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur, llevar a la catastrofe las relaciones intercoreanas y reforzar la barrera de division y confrontacion en desafio a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					Resulta obvio que mientras no sea revocada la politica conflictiva y anti-reunificacion de las autoridades surcoreanas, no sera resuelto el problema de reinicio del turismo aunque tengan lugar cien veces las conversaciones con la parte surcoreana.
					
					El no al reinicio del turismo significa la negativa a las relaciones intercoreanas, a la Declaracion Conjunta N-S y a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion.
					
					Seria tan estupido e imbecil que la camarilla de los titeres conservadores surcoreanos pensara que podria conseguir algo impidiendo la reanudacion del turismo.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben portarse con prudencia viendo correctamente la gravedad de la situacion.

articles.title: Acto central por el centenario del cumpleanos de Kim Il
articles.content:
Acto central por el centenario del cumpleanos de Kim Il
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el centenario de natalicio del combatiente revolucionario Kim Il.
					  Participaron los cuadros del partido, el  estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, familiares de los martires revolucionarios,  benemeritos y  trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					  Kim Il, nacido el 20 de marzo de 1910 en una familia campesina pobre del distrito de Orang de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, se incorporo al Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea e hizo contribucion al logro del triunfo historico de la gran lucha antijaponesa.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria y en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, Kim se encargo de los importantes puestos como el viceministro de Defensa Nacional, el comisario militar de la Comandancia del Frente, el presidente del comite del PTC en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, etc., e hizo aporte especial a la construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, al triunfo de la guerra y al fortalecimiento del PTC.
					
					Ademas, en los tiempos de la restauracion y la construccion posbelica, la revolucion y la construccion socialistas, trabajo del vicepresidente del CC del PTC, el primer viceministro del Consejo de Ministros, el premier del Consejo de Administracion y el primer vicepresidente de la RPDC.
					
					El miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, en su informe senalo que Kim Il fue el ferviente revolucionario y verdadero patriota, quien desde el periodo de la Lucha Revolucionaria Antijaponesa supero incontables pruebas ensangrentadas, apoyando al Presidente Kim Il Sung, y en los anales de la revolucion como la construccion de la nueva patria, la confrontacion antiyanqui y la construccion socialista defendio y apoyo con firmeza al partido y al lider. 
					
					Kim Il, activista sobresaliente del partido y el Estado y combatiente revolucionario fiel a estos, tenia la firme concepcion revolucionaria del lider y mostro el ejemplo real de apoyar con la conciencia pura y obligacion moral al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, destaco y continuo:
					
					Kim Il fue el prototipo del firme revolucionario del tipo jucheano y del hombre autentico, quien recibio respeto y amor del pueblo por su infinita fidelidad al partido y al lider, por su servicio abnegado por la patria y el pueblo y por sus preciosas proezas y nobles rasgos acumulados ante la epoca y revolucion como activista politico del partido y el Estado. 
					
					Todos los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y los trabajadores deben aprender la firme concepcion del lider que tenian Kim Il y otros martires revolucionarios para confiar absolutamente y defender a costa de la vida al Dirigente y hacerse verdaderos camaradas revolucionarios del Songun, combatientes ardientes, que comparten con el la idea, el proposito y el destino en el camino de lucha por llevar al termino feliz la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: No podran encubrir el caracter agresivo de los ejercicios conjuntos
articles.content:
No podran encubrir el caracter agresivo de los ejercicios conjuntos
						
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ATCC) -- EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos trataron de inducir en error la opinion publica interna y externa calificando de "anuales" y "defensivos" los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" y censurando la advertencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por el respecto como "reaccion excesiva".
					Pero, ellos no podran encubrir de ninguna manera el caracter agresivo y provocativo de esos entrenamientos de guerra.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 19 y continua:
					
					  Tanto los guiones como el contenido muestran claramente el caracter ofensivo y peligroso de los polemicos ejercicios para la agresion a la RPDC.
					
					  Aunque EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas hablan tanto del "dialogo" y la "paz", estas palabras no pasan de ser el sofisma para ocultar la siniestra naturaleza de destructor del dialogo y provocador de la guerra.
					
					  De esta manera, EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos mostraron su fachada de perturbadores de la paz que no tienen ningun interes en el relajamiento de tension y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana ni en la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes de Corea sino persiguen unicamente la agresion a la RPDC.
					
					  Estarian muy equivocados si ellos tratan de alcanzar algun objeto amenazando gravemente a la RPDC con los aventureros ejercicios de guerra nuclear y creando la extremada tension en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Como la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea aclaro ya en su reciente informacion, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea, que aprecian mas que su vida la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion, mostraran claramente cuan tragico sera el fin de los provocadores si los imperialistas yanquis y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos se atreven a desatar la guerra de agresion.

articles.title: Presidente angoleno apoya lucha del pueblo coreano por reunificacion
articles.content:
Presidente angoleno apoya lucha del pueblo coreano por reunificacion 
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ATCC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario coreano acreditado en la Republica de Angola presento el dia 11 sus cartas credenciales ante el presidente de este pais, Jose Eduardo Dos Santos.
					  En la ocasion el mandatario angoleno dijo que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Angola y Corea son las especiales con larga historia y su base fue preparada en el periodo de la lucha del pueblo angoleno por la independencia nacional.
					
					  Recordo que el apoyo de Corea a ese pais africano hizo gran aporte a la lucha del pueblo angoleno por lograr la independencia y el desarrollo del pais.
					
					  Hoy tambien las relaciones bilaterales se desarrollan mejor, destaco y prosiguio:
					
					  Le felicito al pueblo coreano por los exitos alcanzados en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera bajo la sabia direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il. 
					
					  Estoy alegre de que Corea logro el nuevo progreso en todos los dominios como la industria y la agricultura superando las reiteradas calamidades naturales y dificultades.
					
					  Angola considera como la iniciativa importante la de Corea de eliminar las relaciones hostiles entre Corea y EE.UU. y concertar el convenio de paz y apoya activamente los esfuerzos de Corea por la normalizacion de las relaciones entre estos dos paises y la reunificacion pacifica del pais.
